This hotel services as a great place to stay, especially as a place to just catch some sleep after spending a long day at the parks. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Reneecamins, We want to say thank you for staying with us and taking time to write about your stay.  We are happy to hear that you found the hotel to be a good choice for your visit to Anaheim and Disneyland.  We really do try to make every stay a good one.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.   Sincerely, Ayesha

Summary: We had a lovely room - lots of space. The beds and pillows were just lovely. The bathroom was modern and both the room and bathroom were very very clean. Loved having a fridge and a microwave in our room, including free WIFI  This was one of the nicest Hotels we stayed in on our one month vacation in the USA.  I found the proprietor extremely helpful and friendly of you take the time to teat people nicely yourself, it goes a long way... Parking was free and it is very close to Disneyland, - download the Uber App - it only cost $6.00 too and from Disneyland for the four of us. It is just a 2 minute walk to a Starbucks and pretty handy to a supermarket and eating places, if you have a car or Uber it.  We also purchased our tickets to Disneyland at the Hotel. Good option.. Overall
Manager Response: Dear Michelle,  From the entire staff at Hotel 414 Anaheim, we want to thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We are so happy to hear our efforts to make every guest feel at home were successful. Your words will show our future guests what a great option we are when they visit Anaheim.  We hope to see you again.

Summary: First time staying here. Better than expected. Room was very clean, service desk attendant was friendly, and parking was free. Would definitely recommend and stay here again. Close to Disney parks and restaurants/fastfood.
Manager Response: Dear Polomom22,  We are so proud to have earned a perfect score from you for your stay.  All of us here work hard to make sure every stay is a wonderful one.  Thank you for giving us a chance and we hope you come back to stay with us again.  Sincerely, Ayesha

Summary: Room was very clean modern and spacious. Large refrigerator and microwave in the room that was perfect for making our own breakfasts all four days. Ideal location for visiting Disneyland. Uber and Lyft was $6.50 each way or less
Manager Response: Dear Brianstrick, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We are happy to hear you liked our rooms and amenities.  We really do try to provide a good value for our guests.  We hope you come back to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: I wish the service was a little bit better. Our toilet got clogged and it took a while to reach the front desk person. The room was excellent. I appreciated the big tv and the spacious layout. Thank hour
Manager Response: Dear 759blo, Thank you for staying with us.  I apologize for the delay in getting help when you had trouble.  I will make sure we don't have that happen again in the future.  I am happy you liked our new, upgraded tv's and rooms.

Summary: This hotel is very comfortable and convenient. Disneyland was only a few blocks down and has easy access to the main attractions and places in Anaheim. The hospitality is great! The staff is very welcoming and customer service is top notch. If you follow them on Instagram they do amazing giveaways!😊 For example I won a pair of oogie boogie Disneyland tickets and a free night stay.  No other hotel will care for their customers like Hotel 414.
Manager Response: Dear Moniixquee,  We are so happy you won our first give-away on Instagram.  Our goal is to provide exceptional customer service and I am glad you go to experience for yourself what our guests say about us.

Summary: Stayed about a week ago and everything was awesome, it was pretty much a perfect stay. Nothing about it was out of the ordinary and I really enjoyed staying somewhere reliable! I have had bad stays at other places in the past.
Manager Response: Dear Jacob, Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We know you had many other choices. I am so happy we were able to make your stay a good one. I hope our future guests will read your review and also decide to stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We stayed here for 1 night after spending all day at Disneyland and needed a good night rest before exploring Anaheim and driving back to SD. The room was clean, spacious, and surprisingly quiet. We stayed on a ground floor room (124) and we didn't hear any noises from upper floor. Typically  you would hear people above you making different kind of noises, but not this time. The bed was comfortable, and having a 12pm check out time definitely helped because we were able to sleep in. Will definitely recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Ro T,  We sincerely thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We are happy to hear you liked our rooms and location.  The beds are an area we get a lot of varying opinions and we are looking into changing them.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This was an over night stay for an impromptu visit to downtown Disney. Well worth it! Modern, clean, and a 15 minute walk to Disney. I wish we could have stayed longer, but this was the last night of a trip. Next time we come this way we will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Tonya,  Thank you so much for giving us an opportunity and choosing to stay with us.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and like our new renovations.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Southern California and Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great stay near Disney and Anaheim convention center for the price
Summary: Only about a mile from Disney this was a great clean place to stay. Everything newly renovated, includes microwave and refrig. Staff was pleasant and accommodating.  Was easy to get to right off the 5 and could get to other places I needed to go in LA.
Manager Response: Dear Nanoorlando, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We are happy to hear you liked our rooms and customer service.  We hope to see you again the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Very nice and clean vert close to Disneyland nice walk! Friendly staff, quiet went in September so besr time to stay and go to Disneyland kids back in school!! Highly recommend this hotel nice and new looking!it was just me and my daughter and we felt very safe Starbucks is right around the corner Walmart down the street close to everything! Will for sure be comming again!
Manager Response: Dear Janine, All of us here at Hotel 414 Anaheim thank you for choosing to stay with us.  We know you had so many options and we sincerely appreciate you giving us an opportunity.  I am happy we made your vacation a good one and that you found our location to be ideal.  We look forward to seeing you next time you visit Disneyland.

Summary: Had a pleasant one night stay here with my mom, got a great deal for a good room! Bathrooms had nice soap dispensers😍 AC worked amazing and is in a sweet area around downtown Disney 🎡🐭 simply good stay, no complaints just as it should be ☺
Manager Response: Dear Madeline,  We are so glad you found our hotel to be a good value and that you liked our newly remodeled rooms.  We work hard to make sure our little hotel is the perfect choice for families visiting Anaheim. Thank you for taking time to let our future guests know about us.

Summary: This was my first visit to this hotel.  The staff was very helpful from the beginning to end. The rooms are clean and well designed. It was a real pleasure staying at this hotel and interacting with the staff.  They treated me like family.  I highly recommend this hotel.  I look forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Brandon, It means so much to us that you liked our hotel.  We really do try to make every stay a comfortable one.  I am very happy to hear you will be returning to stay with us. Having guests return is the best compliment for us.

Summary: So this is our second time staying at Hotel414, and just like the first time, we LOVE it here. The rooms are always clean, property is really quiet, and Ayesha (the manager) is always super cool. She's there to help make your stay as convenient as can be. Plus, they even offer discounts on tickets to both parks,  so that's a plus! We wouldn't think of staying anywhere else! You shouldn't either.  Thanks Ayesha! 👍👍
Manager Response: Dear Miguelito19677,  We are so proud to have returning customers.  I am so happy that we were able to save you money on the Disneyland Passes.  I appreciate your words and hope that our future guests love staying with us for the same reasons you do.

Summary Heading: BEST hotel and EXTREMELY accommodating staff!!
Summary: This had been our go to hotel during previous visits to Disneyland. The property is extremely clean, the rooms are beautiful, spacious enough to move around freely, and the beds are super comfortable! The pool is amazing and you are able to see the Disney fireworks from the pool or the parking lot. It’s also about a 10 to 15 minute walk to Disney, good amount of places to grab some food. As well as a neighborhood Walmart.  Overall a great and affordable place to stay.  This year we decided to stay “try” another hotel since we were traveling with a bigger group(15 people). We had made reservations well in advance since it got great reviews. Well...that was a big let down, that other place was horrible and not safe for families or any human to be honest,  we felt so unsafe and
Manager Response: Dear MommyLajeunesse,  Your wonderful review makes me so proud.  The entire staff always works so hard to make sure our guests are comfortable and happy their stay.  I am glad I could help you and your family out. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Great service, very pleased with efficiency and the perfectly clean room. Well remodeled and spacious. Quiet and convenient location. Would stay here again. Was a great, fair price. Walking distance to a gas station and Starbucks.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We are so proud that you gave us a perfect score.  We really do try hard to make every stay a great one.  We hope you come back and stay with us again.

Summary: Truly a bargain for the Anaheim/Disney area.  We actually stayed for local college visits and it fit our needs perfectly.  The rooms are very clean and newly renovated.  Loved the large mirror over the granite cabinet, which allowed us girls to get ready instead of having to fight for the bathroom.  Plenty of outlets. Great TV.  Water pressure and temperature were also great!  Linen and pillows comfortable. You could walk to Disney if you don’t mind going over the freeway otherwise about a 7-8 dollar Uber ride.  Starbucks on the corner.  The staff are lovely and personable.  Parking right outside your room is nice.  Only negatives... mattress not great and air conditioner is very loud (but works well).  Since Disney is close the fireworks are extremely loud but to me that wasn’t
Manager Response: Dear Teresa,  We are so happy that you appreciated all our efforts to provide a clean, quiet and comfortable hotel for our guests.   You are right about our proximity to Disneyland and that can make the fireworks seem really loud.  Luckily, the fireworks are on a schedule and we can let our guests know to expect them. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary Heading: Suitable for families visting Disneyland, etc. but not on business
Summary: The rooms are clean and staff is friendly. Negatives are: (1) AC is very noisy; (2) the shampoo is not accompanied by a conditioner; (3) plastic cups are depressing (glass cups are my preference); (4) too far to walk to the convention center in the center (walking over the freeway is not comfortable; (5) using the shuttle to get to the convention center is very inconvenient; (6) the only store is a gas station convenience store with only bottled beer and wine with no opener on sale; (7) towels should be replaced as their longevity has been exceeded; (8) shower was difficult to use with no instructions.
Manager Response: Dear Htakabin, We sincerely appreciate your business and your thoughts on your stay.  We are indeed a great value and choice for families visiting Anaheim.  Many of our guests have started using ride share for both the convenience and cost benefit.  For the safety of our guests. we use the individually wrapped cups for sanitary reasons. There is a full grocery store just around the corner from the hotel as well as many restaurants.  All within a 5-minute walk which is not over the bridge.  I will definitely look at the quality of the towels and change them out if necessary.

Summary: We stayed here on our first 3 nights in California with the main objective of going to Disneyland with our daughters and to Anaheim Stadium for the baseball. We couldn’t fault the staff and the Accommodation apart from the pool water was a little unclean and the air con was a bit noisy. Also on weekends in the summer Disneyland closes at midnight and can be noisy after this with people coming back to there rooms. Overall a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Sparkles2,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am happy to hear the staff treated you well.  I will definitely look into the items you mention. We hope you come back to stay with us again.

Summary: We arrived earlier than expected, but we could already check-in. The front desk staff was very nice and friendly as well. From the hotel it is about a 15 minutes walk to the parks and Garden walk.  The room was spacious and clean and with hardwood floors.  We did have some noisy upstairs neighbors as the walls are super thin. All in all good location and I would recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear BettybG8165ID, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We know you have so many options and feel honored that you chose to stay with us. We are looking into how to make our rooms a little more sound proof and apologize for the inconvenience.  We hope you come back to stay with us again.

Summary: Friendly staff and clean rooms. The pool was nice for a break after a long day walking the Disney parks. Location was terrific for the price. The onsite staff were extremely professional and friendly. Would recommend and stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Nicholfam, We sincerely thank you for staying with us. We know our guests have so many choices and we appreciate your business.  Our hotel is definitely a great value and our proximity makes us the perfect base for families while they visit Anaheim.  We hope you come back and stay with us again.

Summary: Stayed 3 nights for a very good price booked through their website. Room and grounds are clean and quiet. Staff was very friendly. It's about a 15-20 minute walk to the parks. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin B, Thank you for staying with us.  We know had many choices and appreciate your business.  Our future guests will appreciate your words about what a great value we are being so close to Disneyland.  We hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: It was a really nice, clean and modern hotel located just a 10 minute walk from Disney. There were food places and a supermarket nearby. Everyone was really friendly and helpful and they let us check in super early. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Gabriella,  Thank you so much for taking time to write about us.  We are so happy you chose to stay with us and we were a pleasant part of your vacation. We hope to see you again the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: quick check in with friendly staff  Room was clean (laminate flooring is nice) and big  Could use bigger towels and pillows  free parking and WIFI  10-15 minute walk to Disneyland  Convenience store Starbucks and Was-Mart all within minutes
Manager Response: Dear Spencer, Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your vacation.  We are happy you found our hotel to be a great value and our location to be perfect for walking to Disneyland. I will definitely take your suggestions about bigger towels to heart and look into changing them.  We hope you give us another chance to earn a 5 star rating the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Excellent stay. Room was very clean and  spacious.  Bathoom clean  close to Disney -15 min walk. Lots of places to eat in the area as well. Would definitely recommend. Great value for your $$ if want to be close to Disney
Manager Response: Dear Joannejdp, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We are happy you found our hotel to be a good value.  We know how expensive it can get for families while they visit the Disneyland area and we really do try hard to provide a good option.  We hope you come back to stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for a trip to Disneyland. The walk was close (20 min), and the hotel was clean and nice. The area was great too, easy access to places (the freeway, a Starbucks, the gas station, etc.). The parking was also pretty good. Most importantly, the service was exceptional. The employees at the front desk were kind, courteous, and friendly. Even the housekeepers were amiable when we walked by. The only issues we had were minor: the hair dryer in our room wasn't working (even when plugged in), and one of our room cards wouldn't work. Other than that, it was a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Tesia, Your review means a lot to all of us here.  We really do work hard to make every guests' vacation a wonderful one and I am so happy to hear we succeeded.  Your insights will help our future guests make the choice to stay with us and I hope you also come back to stay with us.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: So glad I chose this hotel to stay in - trust the other reviews! Updated, clean, and simple hotel room that was only a 10 minute walk to Disneyland! There was even a loud band playing down the street that you could hear outside the room but once you closed the door it was completely quiet. Also Ayesha the GM was so accommodating! We had purchased tix for an event in Vegas that needed to be printed... the hotel doesnt have a "business center" so she gladly printed the tix for us which was very kind and unexpected. Bathroom was nice, especially the walk in shower - very large. Very close to various restaurants, grocery stores, etc; about a 5 min drive. Would certainly stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Go41289205704,  Thank you so much for the glowing review.  You point out all the reasons families love staying with us while they visit Anaheim.  We work hard to provide great customer service and also a wonderful value.  I sincerely appreciate you choosing to stay with us.

Summary: This is a two star motel in a decent location with reasonable prices.  It has the potential to be a really cute motel, however, the owner has skimped on everything. These were perhaps the hardest and most uncomfortable beds I’ve ever encountered in a hotel. The towels were small, cheap and rough and there was no conditioner (shampoo and soap on the wall in the shower). I would not stay here again due to the beds. If they upgraded and made the rooms comfortable and cute they could have a winner by Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Carla, Thank you for giving us a try and staying with us.  We will definitely take your suggestions to heart and look into changing the bedding and towels.  We do try our part to help to reduce plastic waste by providing the soap and shower dispensers and will look into adding conditioner for guests who require it.  We hope you give us another opportunity to earn a 5-star rating.

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located if you're going to Disney. It's 7-8 minutes by car. However price is not high compared to others. I would definitively go back to this hotel. Ayesha is a very nice and lovely. She helps us a lot!
Manager Response: Dear Carmelita, Thank you so much for writing about your stay and letting our future guests know what a great value we are.  We know it can get very expensive visiting the Anaheim area and we truly try our best to provide a wonderful option for families. I look forward to seeing you and your family again when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Great location. You can walk, and get into Disneyland faster than parking, then waiting on the tram.  It looks freshly renovated, shiny floors, new bathroom sink and tub.   I will  definitely return for my next visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  We sincerely appreciate your business and you taking time to let our future guests know about our little property. Our staff does work hard to make sure the rooms are very clean and comfortable.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim and the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed at the hotel while visiting Disneyland. The location was great. A short 15min walk to Disneyland and 2 blocks from a supermarket. The bedroom and bathroom appeared newly renovated and were both very clean and well stocked when we arrived. The staff were friendly, helpful and accommodating. Check in and out was quick and easy. We would highly recommend the hotel and definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear ABC2232,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review for us. We work hard to make our small hotel warm, welcoming and comfortable.  We hope to see you and your friends when you visit Anaheim next time.

Summary: This is a really nice, small, upgraded hotel within a $7 uber ride to Disneyland.   The hotel room had a fridge, microwave, coffee maker, iron and ironing board, good air conditioning, blow dryer, shampoo and body wash...and an AMAZING shower! OMG the water pressure was divine!  You can see a glimpse of the Disneyland fireworks from the pool area. There is a Starbucks about a 5 minute walk away.   The bed was hard. For me that was okay but my husband wasn’t so thrilled.   Hotel staff are super friendly. I would definitely stay here again.   Really happy we found this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Susanneromo,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review.  We love when our guests appreciate our simple and convenient hotel.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay.  We do hear varying opinions on our beds and it is something we are currently looking into.  We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Aisha made us feel at home
Summary: Aisha gave us the best customer service imaginable. I would choose the clean simplicity of this boutique atmosphere over the Hilton. She made our stay amazing by truly being a kind person. We have a new friend and I give her 100% in customer service!
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie, Thank you so much for your kind words.  We truly do love our customers and I am happy to have made your stay so special.  I look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This was cleanest hotel we stayed in during our road trip in the US - it was spotless! The room is huge, it felt extremely safe and the hotel staff are super friendly. We would definitely consider staying here again if we were visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Lauraasong, Your review means so much to all of us here at Hotel 414 because we really do strive to provide a clean and comfortable hotel.  We and our future guests thank you for sharing your experience on Tripadvisor.

Summary Heading: Great hotel - so close to Disneyland
Summary: We had a wonderful 2 nights at this hotel. We were upgraded to a king room for free and the staff were so pleasant and welcoming. Hotel was very clean and tidy. The location is great, just a short walk to Disneyland and plenty of restaurants and shops are close by. We would definitely stay here again and recommend this hotel to our family and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Ballan1,  Thank you so much for taking time to write about your stay.  We really appreciate that you chose to stay with us. I am glad we were able to provide excellent customer service and you enjoyed our rooms. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: This place is truly a gem as far as hotels in this price range. To be fair, it’s technically a motel, as the doors open to the outside of the building. But my cousin and I stayed here for a night while visiting the Disney parks for two days. It’s an easy 20 minute walk to security for the parks, there’s a Starbucks right on the corner (a huge plus), and the customer service is incredible. We worked with Ayesha during our stay, and she was so accommodating and nice. She went out of her way to make sure our stay was a comfortable and pleasant one. The rooms feel simple and modern, and ours was very clean. I will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Mamesteee, Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us.  We are happy to hear that your stay was a good one.  We know it can get very expensive for families when they visit Anaheim so we try hard to make our little inn a wonderful value. Providing a clean, quiet and comfortable place to stay and great customer service are our main goals and I am happy to hear we were able to provide that.  We hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I stayed here for 4 days and 3 nights.  Truly clean hotel, newly renovated, great staff.  Close to McDonald's, el pollo loco, Burger King, Starbucks, Taco Bell, 7-11, gas stations and half a mile to Walmart. $6 Uber to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear hfa60,  We are so proud to hear that we made your stay a great one and the hotel was perfect for your needs.  Our future guests will appreciate your tips as well.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to see you next time.

Summary: Room was very clean and I really liked the fact they have laminate floors, makes it more hygienic. Location is great, close to Disneyland and lots of restaurants nearby.  Ayesha, at the front desk is super friendly and accommodating. Would definitely stay again. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Evangelina,  We sincerely appreciate you taking time to write about us.  I am happy to hear we made your stay a good one.  We hope you choose to stay with us again when you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Great quality rooms for the price!
Summary: We stayed for a total of three nights and on the first night, the parking lot was closed because it was freshly painted, but 414 made arrangements with the hotel next door to let guests park there for the night, so it wasn't an issue.  We were upgraded - all three nights - to a king bed room.  We stayed in two different rooms (one for two nights, then another for a third night later in the week).  Both rooms were very clean and very nice looking.  You can see this in the pictures on this site.  There are dispensers with hand soap at the sink and with shampoo and body wash in the shower, which is much more convenient than the little bars and bottles.  Finally, when we checked out after the first two nights, we needed somewhere to park the car while we spent the day at Disneyland,
Manager Response: Dear Createdamadman, Thank you for your patience while we closed our parking lot for maintenance.  We tried to make sure our guests were not inconvenienced too much.  I am happy to hear you noticed our efforts to provide clean and comfortable rooms. We also understand that visiting Disneyland can be expensive so we try our best to help out when we can with value services such as parking. We hope you will stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Spent 6 nights here and overall had a great experience! Rooms are updated, which is nice. Only complaint would be that with it being a older motel, the walls are a bit thin so you can hear your neighbors, but that wasn't that big of a deal. Close to Disney parks and freeway makes accessing both fairly easy. Free parking was nice as well. Any time we asked for something at the front desk, they were helpful. Would definitely stay again and recommend to others!
Manager Response: Dear Meghan N, Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are indeed an older hotel, but we try to provide a great value for our guests when they visit Disneyland. I am glad we were able to provide excellent customer service as well.  We hope to see you again when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Great place to stay. Tidy rooms and friendly staff! Close to Disneyland and close to plenty of restaurants for meals. Highly recommended to anyone to stay, great prices to stay also. Rooms are spacious!
Manager Response: Dear Teagan1991, Thank you so much for taking the time to write about your stay. We are happy you found our rooms clean and comfortable. We know how expensive it can be to visit Southern California so we try our best to provide a great value. We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: Consider if you bring baby in this hotel
Summary: I would like share my experience for staying in this hotel with my 21 months son. After checking in, I was being rejected while asking the front desk to provide a kettle. The below response make me may feel helpless :  1. I expressed my necessity as I need boiling water to make milk to my toddler.  Hence, they explained that their kettle was stolen by other customers before and they would not provide anymore. Even I am willing to pay deposit, they said their kettle is more expensive than my usd100 deposit. This is the first time being treated like a thief in a hotel!!!!!   2. They give me a suggestion to reheat water by using their microwave. However, there are only recycle cups in the room. The front desk told me they can borrow a SMALL TEA CUP and hang up the phone. Finally,
Manager Response: Dear Alicerabbit035,  Your review of our hotel shows how the language barrier was a tough one to overcome.  Most of our guests rave about our customer service and the value we provide.  Our hotel description clearly says we have in-room coffee makers and refrigerators and microwaves.  We do not advertise or claim to have tea kettles in our rooms. Guests often use the microwave or the coffee machine to heat up their water, or go to the neighborhood Starbucks.  The General Manager went above and beyond to help you out and I apologize if that was not enough for you. The room deposit is clearly listed and is refundable. In the future, please choose to stay at Airbnb or a much larger hotel if your needs require the amenities not listed on our website.

Summary: Great value for the price. Clean room, nice people, fast checkin and checkout, free wifi, free parking, and great location. A walking distance of Disneyland, California Adventure and Downtown Disney. At night, you will see the .fireworks.
Manager Response: Dear Hellen, Thank you so much for taking time to write about your stay.  All of us here at Hotel 414 work hard to make sure we provide a good value for all our guests. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: It's so difficult to find a moderately priced hotel near Disneyland that is actually clean! I have stayed here several times now and the rooms have always been clean & comfortable. The front desk has always been super kind and very helpful. Only wish they had complimentary breakfast. But with free parking & no resort fee, we can afford to grab Starbucks just around the corner. It's about a 10 minute walk to the park or a $6 lyft ride. We look forward to staying here again soon.
Manager Response: Dear Jnsharma3, Thank you for taking time to write about your stay so that our future guests will know what a great value we are.  I am happy that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable.  Excellent customer service is our number one goal and I am happy to hear we met our goal.  We hope you choose to stay with us again next time you are in Orange County, California.

Summary: Long story short, our Disney trip didnt start off very "magical". Booked 4 nights somewhere else. The place was disgusting to say the least. Immediately checked out, jumped on Google maps and found this place. What a difference! We get there at almost midnight and Ayesha at the front desk was AWESOME!!! She took care of us right away. Showed us a few rooms and had us checked in in no time at all. The rooms were clean, smelled good and had a modern contemporary yet warm cozy feel to it. From soft comfortable sheets and pillows to beautifully decorated walls, and of course I must mention the clean glass shower doors, this place was PERFECT. Plus its located only about a mile away from the front gates to Disney/California Adventure Land. Can easily walk there. Thanks again Ayesha.
Manager Response: Dear Miguelito19677,  Thank you so much for taking time to write such a glowing review. Your review sums up all the aspects we work hard to provide for our guests.  Our future guests will also thank you for answering some of their questions before they also choose to stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you next time you are in Anaheim and Southern California.

Summary: Room is clean and quiet. Lots of free parking. ART city bus picks up right in front, but walking is easy to local restaurants. Ayesha was very helpful with information. Would love to stay here again. Thank You Hotel 414!
Manager Response: Dear Rimshot57, Thank you for your 5-star review.  The entire team appreciates your words. We are happy to hear you found our location convenient and our customer service helpful. We look forward to seeing you next time your'e in Anaheim.

Summary: The mattress is so comfortable I love it. The apartment is clean and nice. Also it is a walking distance from Disneyland . It is very quite and safe. I recommend it for couples and families. Price is good.
Manager Response: Dear Husain A, Thank you for taking time to write about your stay.  We are so happy that we made your stay a good one.  We look forward to your next stay.

Summary: We came up from San Diego the night before our day at Disneyland. It was the perfect place to launch from bright and early. Clean, affordable with free parking - and excellent customer service. I actually booked my room for the wrong night and when I didn't check in they contacted me. When I explained I had booked it for the wrong evening, they amended my reservation. Much appreciated. Thanks Hotel 414!
Manager Response: Dear Nicole, We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  As you saw for yourself, our main goal is make sure our guests feel at home with us.  Our future guests thank you for your review. See you next time when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Needed a motel on the fly. Heard of 414, so I checked it out. Very friendly front desk attendant Ayesha got me checked in quick. Nice hardwood floors, a quaint place, with contemporary furnishings. Wall heater/ac great, flat screen tv, refrigerator, microwave. Did it for me. Will definitely stay here again, thanks Ayesha for a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Samuel P, Thank you so much for taking time to write about your experience at our little hotel. We really do try hard to make every stay comfortable and I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: check in was a breeze and the front desk was very thoughtful to allow me to check in slightly early and have a later check in as well since my flight was late. the location of the hotel is close to starbucks and some restaurants and walking distance to bus stops. the room i got comes with a king sized bed, and it is clean and spacious. the bathroom has no bath tub with a standing shower (thats not a problem for me). it will be good if it has some cups near the sink where we can place toothbrush in it. shower gel and shampoo are provided as well. overall, it was a good and nice experience for a small hotel which is quite attentive to its guests.
Manager Response: Dear MarinatedC, Thank you for your rave review.  Nothing makes us happier than happy guests. We are happy to hear we could accommodate your early check in and you found our rooms clean and spacious.  We look forward to having you stay with us the next time you visit Southern California.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for your Disneyland Trip
Summary: It was mine and my girlfriend’s first time to Disneyland for X-mas and we needed a place to lay our heads for 3 nights. We were looking for something inexpensive, close to the park, and clean. We stumbled upon the 414.   When we arrived on Friday night we were greeted warmly by the front desk clerk and he answered all my questions regarding Disneyland and the surrounding area.  When we got to our room we noticed how clean and nicely designed they were.   The room was big and the bed was comfy.   We were close to the Park as well, with the 414 being about a 10-15 minute walk or a five minute drive.   Parking was free with the booking and an Uber ride was about $7 one way to the park.   Overall, we had a great experience here and would gladly return for another Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Dear DEATHbyOLFA,   Thank you so much for your review.  We always aim for 5-stars and it makes me happy that you appreciated our efforts.  Customer service is our main goal, bu your words sum up exactly what a great value we are for guests. We hope to see you again when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Good value, very clean, good water pressure and comfy beds. Everything you need for your stay. Well worth the money and time to stay at this hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful. My international flight came in late after hours and they were there in no time to check me in and look after me.
Manager Response: Dear RocknRumble, We are so happy to hear your stay was a good one.  Our staff always strives to accommodate our guests and I am pleased to hear you found our little hotel to be a good value.  We hope you can visit Anaheim soon and that you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for our trip to Disney. There are some hotels directly across from Disney that are closer. However, the prices are higher for those closer hotels. It’s a walk to Disney but not too bad. Room was simple and nice. Service nice. Parking was included. Ice machine at ground level. Soaps were in a dispenser. Small pool. Two levels. No elevator.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca O, Thank you for taking time to let our future guests know what a great value we are.  We are indeed located around the corner from Disneyland, but as you found out for yourself, our price is well worth the walk.  We know how hard families work and we want to make sure that we are a great value. We hope to see you again on your next visit.

Summary: Best hotel to stay at close to Disneyland n gd service thank u highly recommend this place again to stay at when returning back to Anaheim again the people are very friendly n willing to help in every way possible to make ur stay da best ...
Manager Response: Dear Antonio S,  Thank you so much for your 5-star review.  Happy guests is our number one goal and your words make all of us at Hotel 414 very proud. We look forward to hosting you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The stay at this hotel was great!  Very clean and well maintained. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. We were able to check in early and leave our vehicle in the lot and utilize ride sharing companies to get to Disneyland.  I definitely would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Marie, Your 5-star review makes all our efforts worth it. Our number one goal is to make every guest feel welcome and I'm happy to hear you loved your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit it Southern California.

Summary: It was our second stay here at this motel and it was definitely worth it for staying 2-3 nights. The rooms are quaint but clean the AC is a little bit old but still covers the whole room. The bathroom is pretty decent and newly remodeled as well. It’s a 5 minute Uber ride to Disneyland which was a plus and a Starbucks around the corner if you need a coffee run. All around was a great stay. Will definitely checking in again.
Manager Response: Dear Peach3ss, Thank you for your 5-star review and letting our future guests know what a good choice our hotel is for families visiting Anaheim. Our guests do love our proximity to Disneyland and grocery stores and coffee shops. I am happy to hear you will be staying with us next time.

Summary: We had such a great stay here! The staff are lovely and welcoming, and allowed us to park our car before check in so that we could walk to Disneyland :) the room was incredible, great value for money.
Manager Response: Dear Taratui, We are so happy to hear we could make your stay a great one.  Our entire team works hard to make our little hotel is a great value for all our guests. I am glad you liked our renovations. We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: Pulled up,  clean motel. Very friendly staff. The rates were very economical and very close to Disney Land. We're wil stay here again for sure! Can't say enough good things about the place and the clean friendly services we were shown.
Manager Response: Dear Doug N, Your words make us so proud.  Thank you for taking time to let our future guest know what a great value we are and more importantly, how hard we work to make our hotel clean and comfortable.  See you next time you are in Anaheim.

Summary: Room is very basic. Very clean and seemed updated. We were only sleeping there so we thought that would be okay for us. Unfortunately the beds were very uncomfortable. There was also no clock in our room and only two hangers. Overall I could probably spend a little more money to get a lot more at a different hotel. It served its purpose for our two nights in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear SarahFergy, Thank you so much for taking time to let us know how we can improve our hotel for our future guests. We are constantly trying to make our hotel more comfortable and your opinion on the beds is one we will look into.  I do wish you would have contacted us at the front desk for a clock and hangers.  We always have extras on hand.  I hope you give us another opportunity to make your stay perfect.

Summary: I stayed here at Hotel 414 Anaheim for 4 nights.This hotel is close to Disneyparks. It's a little hike for other stuff like food etc unless you like Pizza and Salad buffet and meters from Taco Bell, McDonald's, Burger King and KFC. A gret price for what amenities other hotels in the area offer. Very friendly staff, I would say this family were one of the friendly people I've meet and very clean rooms.
Manager Response: Dear MikeCoke, Thank you for your 5-star review and letting our future guests know what to expect when they stay with us. Our entire staff appreciates your kind words.  We hope to see you again if you are in the Anaheim area.

Summary: I had another great stay at the Hotel 414.  The hotel was exceptionally clean, the front desk accomodating and friendly.  The room as I mentioned was excetionally clean and has been updated with hardwood laminate floors, flat screen tv, shower with great water pressure, microwave, mini fridge-  The hotel is walking distance to Disneyland.  Bus service to Disney is available via the Anaheim Rapid Transit (ART).  Take bus 10.  Also, the fireworks can be seen from the hotel by the area.
Manager Response: Dear Mark N,  We absolutely love it when a guest returns to stay with us because it shows that our efforts are noticed. Your review sums up exactly what our hotel is and how hard to make it a clean, comfortable and a good value. We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We were very impressed with this motel. It is very convenient for a Disneyland trip. The accommodation is clean and has everything you need such as hairdryer, iron and coffee making facilities. The staff are very helpful. We purchased our Disneyland tickets from reception getting a small reduction in price and making it easier and quicker to enter the park. We used Uber to get to the park and back and it took only a few minutes and was very good value. Wd even watched the fireworks from outside our room. We would definitely recommend this motel.
Manager Response: Dear Helen, Thank you so much for your kind words. Cleanliness and customer service are our main priorities and all of us at Hotel 414 are happy we met our goal.  Your tips for our future guests are also spot on.  We hope to see you again when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: The room was very comfortable and very close to Disneyland. The shower was very nice and the bathroom was very clean. The bed felt a little stiff at first but was very comfy to sleep on. Will definitely use again if I go to Disneyland again.
Manager Response: Dear Dalton, Thank you so much for taking time to let us know about your stay.  Our beds are definitely something our guests mention to us.  I am happy to hear you found them comfortable. We look forward to making your next stay in Anaheim and Orange County even better.

Summary: Beautiful ,clean place,friendly staff ,walking distance to Disneyland , bus shuttle available or you can take uber for $6-$7 to Disneyland. The room was very comfortable . Definitely coming back!! Small but really nice place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Samira, Your words make the entire team at Hotel 414 very happy and proud.  We really do work hard to make our hotel clean, comfortable and welcoming.  We also are happy that you noticed that even though our hotel is not very big, we provide a wonderful value and convenient location for our guests.  Thank you for sharing with our future guests.  I hope to see you on your next visit to Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Nice and decent hotel near to Disneyland!
Summary: I heard that this is a pretty new hotel. It's a very nice hotel that's very close to Disneyland. My family and I booked an uber for $6-$7 (10 minutes drive) to get to Disneyland. They also have Disney shuttle from the hotel for around $5 per person.  Great experience with clean room and friendly staff! Would definitely come back again!
Manager Response: Dear Teme93,  I sincerely appreciate you taking time to write about your stay. All of us at Hotel 414 work hard to make sure all our guests have a clean and comfortable place to stay during their vacation.  We look forward to seeing you next time.

Summary: Excelente hotel, great service and extremely clean rooms we stayed 5 nights we had the best time on our little vacation we walk to Disney everyday pretty convenient not having to drive our car. The lady at the front desk was pretty helpful and the housekeeping did and outstanding job leaving our room super clean everyday. Little extra note the shower 🚿 it’s the best so highly recommended
Manager Response: Dear Liza,  We are so happy you chose to stay with us during your vacation. Our entire team thanks you for taking time to write about us so our future guests can also experience our customer service and value.

Summary: Very nice and helpful owners, the room was perfectly renovated and clean. Parking place in front of the room and we could walk to disneyland in 15 minutes. We had a room with two queen size beds and the bathroom was very new.
Manager Response: Dear Jensmozar, Thank you so much for letting our future guests know about our little hotel.  We know that guests have countless choices when they visit Anaheim and it makes us very proud when guests leave us with a positive experience.  We hope you come back to stay with us again.

Summary Heading: close to Disneyland, great prices, modern design!
Summary: great stay at Hotel 414!  modern design, convenient location, extremely friendly staff and great prices!  stayed here for a total of 5 nights, really easy check in/check out.  The phone & text service was very convenient, I could ask any questions I wanted via text.  FREE parking! and going to your car was extremely easy (unlike hotels where you have to catch the elevator, walk to parking garage etc). location is a 2min drive to Disneyland and walking distance to a Starbucks!
Manager Response: Dear AKT143,  Your review makes all of us at Hotel 414 so proud.  You point out all the things we work hard to provide for all our guests. The text service is a new service for us and I am happy that it worked well for you.  Thank you for your review.  Our future guests and myself sincerely appreciate your words.

Summary: The staff were great.  The rooms were clean and its within a walking distance to Disneyland.   You do have to walk by the freeway but its not too bad.  Rooms equipped with necessary amenities.  Overall great.
Manager Response: Dear Arcelia C,  Thank you for taking the time to write about us.  All of us at Hotel 414 know it takes time and effort for you to write about us. We are happy to know that you found our little hotel to be a great choice for your vacation.

Summary: I was pleased when I first walked in my room and there was no carpet.  The room was comfy, clean and the bathroom has high end fixtures making it feel a little more homey. The manager, Ayesha, is so pleasant.  I felt more like I was staying in a friends guest room rather than just a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy,  Thank you so much for taking time to write about your wonderful experience with our future guests.  I am so happy we were able to make your stay a comfortable one.  Our main goal is to make every guest feel like they are family and it makes me happy to hear your words. We look forward to having you stay with us when you come back to Anaheim.

Summary: Truly a great value. Clean, contemporary and convenient.. Staff go beyond the norm to make your stay pleasant and uncomplicated. Close to everything, yet tucked away from the chaos. Nothing fussy. Nothing fancy. Perfect for your Anaheim adventures. Will stay here every visit. Bonus tip, save on parking. Walk to the Kingdom, Uber back. No regrets.
Manager Response: Dear Rick, Thank you so much for your 5-star review.  Our goal is to make every stay wonderful and all of us at Hotel 414 are proud when guests appreciate our efforts. We are indeed a small hotel, but we try to provide affordable accommodations for families without sacrificing cleanliness and comfort.  We hope you choose to stay with us again if you visit Southern California.

Summary: We had a great time there. We were travelling with our young daughter (14 months). They were so super friendly and supportive and everything was super clean! This is an amazing place to stay. We would definitly stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Tennisonhorse,  Thank you for taking time to let our future guests know how much you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our entire staff is very happy we helped make your vacation a good one.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: We loved our stay here.  The staff is very helpful and friendly.  The room was clean.  And you can see the Disneyland fireworks from the parking lot. We will stay here again next time we go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Jamie, We are so happy you loved your stay with us.  Our goal is always to make every stay a great one and its wonderful when guests write about it.  We look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: This hotel was amazing. Super clean and quiet. Comfy beds and hot water. Staff was friendly and I had no issues checking in or out. I’ll definitely be using this hotel for all future Disneyland trips!
Manager Response: Dear Mike,  Thank you for taking time to write about us.  All of us at Hotel 414 try hard to make every stay a nice one and it really does make us happy when guests appreciate our efforts. See you next time you visit Anaheim and Disneyland.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Hotel 414. The rooms are a modern decor and everything is clean. Management is very good and they clearly take pride in their property. The location is excellent. It’s very nice and safe with security cams watching your car. I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear mjw9219, Thank you for sharing your experience at our little hotel with our future guests. Your words mean so much to the entire staff here.  We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Very nice place away from all the madness of busy Disney. 15 minute walk to Disneyland and California Adventure Parks. Staff was very friendly and accommodated everything we asked for. Very easy to get to by vehicle and close to food, shopping, and everything around the Disney Parks.
Manager Response: Dear J Kaleo,  Thank you for taking time to let our future guests know about your stay. We are a small hotel and words like yours mean so much to the entire staff because we really do work hard to make every stay special.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: This was a great place to stay. Clean room, friendly, helpful customer service, only 15 min walk to Disneyland, and you can see the fireworks from the parking lot. We will definitely stay here again - you can’t go wrong for the price.

We had an awesome two nights here. The rooms are clean, great shower  and comfy bed. 15 min walk to Disney.  Staff were very helpful and went out of their way to answer all our questions etc. would stay again.

Took a quick trip to Anaheim and chose to stay at Hotel 414 for 2 nights. Everything was great from the checkin to the room. The room was so clean! We loved it. We had some questions about Disneyland and Ayesha was very helpful. After Disneyland we came back to the room to relax and had many options on the TV to watch. Would come visit again!

We had a terrific stay at the hotel. The room was clean and cozy and Ayesha at the front desk was super helpful. She recommended restaurants nearby and even let us have an early check in. All in all, a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Tomerpacific, The title to your review made us very happy. Although our little hotel is an older one, we know that guests appreciate how clean and comfortable our rooms are.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.

Summary: This is a great place to stay the nigh. It is super clean and cute for a fantastic price. It close to Disney parks, walking distance if you have a good condition or you can just uber/Lyft ride for a minimum fee. I would recommend to anyone who is on a budget and want to stay at a nice and comfortable place. By the way, the beds are super comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Mrjrfrausto,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  Our entire staff is happy to hear we made your stay a good one. We love when our guests appreciate the value and convenience our hotel provides.  We look forward to hosting you and your family on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We arrived for our reservation two days early and were accommodated immediately. The ladies at the front desk were both polite and informative. We were able to walk to Disney in only 15 minutes. Perfect location with so many food choices within walking distance.  You can see the fireworks from Disney poolside as well. We had the best stay of our California trip here.
Manager Response: Hi Marsha, What a lovely review! Thank you for taking the time to go into so much detail to demonstrate how happy you were. You had the experience that we want to provide for each and every one of our guests! We hope that you will have another opportunity to visit Disney, and stay with us again very soon!   Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: Hotel was very clean , comfortable, SAFE and welcoming most professional.  Very good value would highly recommend.  In walking distance to Disneyland and many nearby amenities. Was excellent value. Outdoor pool is perfect spot to relax and watch the Disneyland fireworks, clear view. Overall great value and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Candace F, Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience with our future guests. Our team works hard to make sure every guest leaves with a pleasant memory of their stay with us.  We hope you choose to stay with us again the next time you are in Southern California.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for Disneyland Vacation
Summary: Six minutes from Disneyland.   They sell Disneyland tickets at a discount, and yes, they are legitimate.  Shuttle to Disneyland for $5/ person, but we did Uber which is $6.   Very nice , clean , and comfortable stay.  We stayed in a two queens room.  There is a refrigerator, microwave, and coffee in the room.  Towels and soaps are provided.  If you are staying here without the intention of going to Disneyland, just beware of the loud fireworks close by.  The staff are amazing and professional as well.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth, Thank you from our entire staff for taking time to share your thoughts.  Nothing makes us happier than when our guests are comfortable and happy at our little hotel. We do try hard to provide a good value for our guests.  The fireworks are indeed visible from the hotel, but luckily, Disneyland is very good about starting them 9:30 and ending at about 9:45 PM.  We hope to see you again when you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Rooms are recently remodeled with great AC, nice bedding, 4 fluffy pillows, fridge, coffee maker and microwave. Bed is average and a little soft. No elevator to the second floor. No breakfast. Hotel staff are exceptionally nice, helpful and welcoming. Walking time to Disneyland is around 15-20 minutes depending on how fast you walk. Felt fairly safe walking back to hotel after leaving Disneyland at midnight. There’s Starbucks, a convenient store, Taco Bell and gas station near the hotel. Did not use the pool and it looks fairly clean. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Yvonne C,  What a lovely review.  Thank you from all of us at Hotel 414 Anaheim for sharing your experience with our future guests. You pointed out all the things we work hard to provide for all our guests.  We know families save up time and money to visit Disneyland and we want to make sure we provide a good value.  We hope you choose to stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel and staff, 2nd year in a row staying here
Summary: This was our second year staying here, we love how close it is to Disney(within walking distance). Our kids love the pool and that they are able to see Disney’s fireworks from the pool. Ayesha and the other staff are amazing, always friendly and willing to help.  The rooms are spacious and very clean. Our family will be back!!
Manager Response: Dear MommyLajeunesse,  Thank you for coming back to stay with us.  Your review really shows how hard we all work to make sure families like yours are comfortable and choose to come back to stay at Hotel 414.  Our entire team is very happy to hear we made your stay a good one, again. See you next year.

Summary: Love the location, less than five minutes drive yo Disney’s parking lot.  The lot serves both parks and downtown Disney.  Heard someone walked over to the park and it took them 15 minuets to the front of the park.  But do you really want to walk another 15 minuets after walking all day inside the park?  Lots of fast food choices around the area.  A huge Walmart and shopping area within a twenty minutes drive.  There is a smaller Walmart nearby, but I think it’s supermarket only.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Rooms are outside (motel like).  Get a room on the second floor to avoid people walking in front of your room.  Staff was friendly.  Will definitely return for future Disney visits.
Manager Response: Dear Benson,  Thank you for your review and sharing your positive experience with our future guests. I think you pointed out all the amenities which make our hotel and ideal choice for families when they visit Anaheim and Disneyland.  Our staff is looking forward to hosting you on your next visit to Disneyland and Southern California.

Summary: Ayesha at the front desk is respectful and courteous at all times when working. She accommodates the best as she can and makes sure your requests are fulfilled. No complaints, you definitely get your money’s worth for the price you pay and hotel is well upkept! Keep up the awesome work Ayesha and the staff. A loyal guest like myself will be back when in the California area.
Manager Response: Dear Silvano,  Thank you from all of us at Hotel 414 for your wonderful comments.  Nothing makes us happier than when guests like yourself are comfortable and happy with their stay.  Your words are truly what makes us continue to work hard to make every guest's experience as good as yours.  See you next time.

Summary: This place was superb, Ayesha from the front desk was absolutely perfect! She took care of me every step of the way. She was also able to get me a double bed room on the spot when booking.com messed up. Anyways this is the best hotel in the area definitely recommend
Manager Response: Dear Kyle, All of us at Hotel 414 are happy to hear we made your vacation just a little better with our customer service.  That's what we are here for. We really do appreciate your kind words about our little hotel and hope to make our future guest's stay just as wonderful. Thank you for choosing to stay with us.

Summary: We had a wonderful time. Aisha and staff were very nice and accommodated all our needs!  Hotel was clean, beds were comfortable, bathroom was modern. Would stay again!  Easy to get to Disney and freeway!
Manager Response: It is always a pleasure to receive such a wonderful review! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your visit. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and thank you for the generous compliments.  We love when guests appreciate our cleanliness and value.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to Anaheim.    Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: I was a little worried based on other reviews, but found it safe and clean. The bed was comfortable enough. Room is nothing spectacular but it was clean and I was never concerned about safety. Definitely just a cheap flipped hotel, but if you just need a decent place to sleep for a night or two, this is fine. Only complaints were the AC and the noise from the people above us. Sounded like they were running back and forth for a couple hours. Walls are thin. AC was very far from the bed and was turning off and on very loudly all night. Appreciated both a fridge and microwave in room.
Manager Response: Dear Jenn716, Thank you for taking time to write about your stay and share your experience with future guests.  We are indeed a smaller, older hotel but we do work hard to provide the value and convenience so many of our guests love. We hope you give us another opportunity to earn a 5 star review.  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Clean, renovated hotel with excellent front desk
Summary: stayed in a king size room for 4 days. Clean and updated rooms, ample parking, excellent housekeeping and smooth checkin checkout at front desk. Got disney tickets for discount. Very close to mickeys parking, walmart, and at a walking distance to disney, though we used our vehicle. Addition of a clock would be helpful.
Manager Response: Hi Nikhil, We are so glad you chose to stay with us during your Disney trip.  I am glad we could help you save some money by getting your tickets with us. We know how expensive it can be to visit Disneyland.  We do try our best to provide the best value and I'm glad you appreciated our location as well.  We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim and hope you stay with us again.  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: My family and I all stayed at Hotel 414 this past month. We’re were celebrating our son’s birthday at Disneyland and this hotel was so great! This hotel is very clean, and so nice and neat! It’s very close to the Disneyland park and we just got on the shuttle and we were at the park within minutes! The family who owns the hotel are so sweet and so helpful! I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone and I will definitely be staying here the next time we visit!
Manager Response: Dear Taylor, A belated happy birthday to your son. I am so delighted that you chose to celebrate such a special occasion with us. We hope your family had a great time at the park and we hope to have you back in the near future and take part in more of your life's celebrations and milestones.  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: Found it on Travelocity. Went based off the reviews and cleanliness. Wasn't expecting much considering it was a smaller hotel but to my surprise, it was great and really nice! Super clean, kind staff and the simplicity of it makes it that much better! Everything looks exactly as the pictures. Definitely recommend this place 100% if you're staying in the area. Good pricing and around the corner from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hi Ileana, We are very happy to have provided you with a pleasant surprise in terms of both the quality of room that we have, and the level of cleanliness that we maintain. We appreciate your recommendation, and we hope to welcome you back to our hotel again soon.    Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: I’m not sure why this hotel is not on the top for best value.  First it is spotless, hardwood floors, microwave, coffee and mini fridge. Shower is a walk-in and not a tub, water pressure is great. Shampoo and conditioner inside the shower.  The Air Conditioning is the best I’ve used in a long time.  The young man and his mom are the nicest people and a wealth of information.  I’m a little hesitant to leave this review because you guys are going to snatch up all the rooms in seconds . Stay away from room 114 ... that’s my room !
Manager Response: Hi Kendra, Thank you so much for taking time to let us know you loved your stay.   Our remodel has been a hit with our guests and I'm glad you also think so.  We hope to see you again on your next visit to sunny Southern California.  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: This hotel is immaculate and clean. It’s a recently remodel mid century modern hotel with first class service. Everyone is so exceptional who works there especially Ayesha who made our stay so special.  The rooms have a fresh and welcoming vibe. There is a very well kept pool on the property. The rooms come with a microwave, mini fridge and a coffee maker. This property is also steps away from a Starbucks to help you with energizing you before your big day at Disneyland.  This hotel is about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland and about a 4 minute drive. It is very convenient. Ayesha or any of the staff are more than helpful with any questions that you might have. I am so impressed with our stay and looking forward to our return.
Manager Response: Hi Stephanie, Thank you for your feedback.  We really appreciate you taking time to share your experience with us. It is always wonderful to hear positive feedback with regards to our staff and we sincerely thank you for these comments. We are happy to hear that the appreciated the cleanliness of the room and that you had a comfortable stay. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Anaheim.  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: Comfortable, clean, and a great value!
Summary: We were displaced from our home due to plumbing problems and the 414 was just what we needed, clean, comfortable and quiet.  We had a room downstairs in the back corner.  The beds were good (no rolling to the center like other higher end places we've stayed), the shower water pressure was great.  No pets and no smoking which was a plus since we are all allergic.  Free parking for one vehicle which is awesome.  Refrigerator and microwave were a plus.  Friendly staff and very clean grounds.  I wish we had stayed here the week before (stayed at another, more expensive hotel when the plumbing problems started - that was horrible).  Overall a great stay, very clean, friendly staff, and great value!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are very pleased with your feedback, and to know that you enjoyed the clean, comfortable room that we provided you with. We wish that you had stayed with us the previous week also, and we hope to host you for a longer stay on your next visit!  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: I totally recommend this hotel. The  first thing that I noticed was the parking lot was extremely clean. The lobby immaculate.The check in and check out attendants were friendly. Room was clean and updated. Shower water pressure was awesome.  A night parking lot  was very quiet  and we felt secure leaving our vehicle parked. We will be back that’s for sure!
Manager Response: Hi Jessica, Thank you for choosing to stay with us recently.  Our staff works hard to make every guests' stay wonderful. I sincerely appreciate you letting our future guests know what a great value our little hotel is.  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary Heading: 414 is the best place to stay in Anaheim.
Summary: Recently stayed for a few nights here last week and it was one of the best. Nothing like pulling up to a quiet hotel and being greeted by a warming hotel staff. The prices are the best you’ll find around that area, especially with Disneyland being a walk over the hill. There’s so many food options to choose from especially late night food. Anaheim packing house just down the way and Angel stadium being 5min drive down Ball rd. I recommend staying here! If you’re looking for a super super clean room with the best TV and cable oh and their showers are the best, this is where it’s at.  You won’t be disappointed in your stay here. The best part is how small it is and you don’t have a bunch of other people around. Next time you stay in Anaheim book here!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback.  We are happy to hear that you had such a wonderful experience with us and that our hotel met your expectations. We appreciate your review, and are delighted that you recommend our hotel so highly. We hope to see you again soon.  Best Regards, Hotel 414 Customer Care Team

Summary: It was clean and remodeled which was nice. However, the bed was horribly uncomfortable, there was a gap under the door so all the cold/hot air came in and you could hear every noise, sneeze, and footstep from all your neighbors. Plus there wasn't an elevator so you have to lug your crap upstairs on some not so fun concrete steps... Overall its a decent clean place but I would never stay here again. I want to be comfortable after a long day of walking and this place just didn't do it for us.
Manager Response: Dear Fallon,  Thank you for writing about your stay.  I will definitely look into the items you mentioned.  We sincerely appreciate your business.

Summary: For what you are paying this is an excellent economy hotel. Rooms are very clean with modern decor, and the bed is very comfortable. Great shower with toiletries built in (bring conditioner, only thing they don’t have), and a small but well maintained pool. The location is walking distance to Disney and you can watch the fireworks every night from the parking lot. Also, you have a fridge and a microwave which is always helpful. Very easy and quick check in/out process and the women behind the desk were very nice. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Sqwidget, Thank you for taking time to write about the hotel.  It makes our entire team very proud to know we were able to make your stay pleasant. Our focus is always on making every stay a memorable and comfortable one. We look forward to your next visit to Anaheim and our hotel.

Summary: nice place and recomended.Very CLEAN👍👍👍the best.maybe i will comeback again.thank you hotel 414🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻the room is so clean and looks nice.the water in bathroom is bigger than i expected.thumbs up👍👍👍🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🎉🎉🎉
Manager Response: Dear Steven, We love when guests use emojis to describe out hotel.  I am proud of everyone at our hotel for making your stay a wonderful one. See you next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: This was my third time staying here and it never disappoints. Extremely reasonable rates, yet you still get a first-class experience.  The rooms are immaculately clean, the front desk and maids bend over backwards to be helpful, and the room is (longer) walking distance to Disneyland. I'm an AP pass holder, so it's just a short drive to the parking lot, which I love!  Also, very close to lots of restaurants and convenience stores. This is definitely my go-to hotel to stay at. Will be back!
Manager Response: Dear MrArmandillo, Welcome back to our hotel. Thank you for your rave review. You mentioned all the things we work hard to maintain in order to make every guests' vacation a fabulous one. I look forward to seeing you the next time you use your Disneyland Annual Pass.

Summary Heading: Excellent stay!! I would definitely recommend it!!
Summary: I really like this hotel, the price wasn’t high, it was clean, brand new, spacious room, comfortable, 15 min walking distance from Disney and there is a convenience store and a starbucks right next to the hotel, plus the staff is very nice and helpful!! I will definitely come back !!
Manager Response: Dear Antonio,  We love when guests appreciate the value our hotel provides when they visit Anaheim. Thank you for taking time to write about your stay and letting our future guests know about Hotel 414.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My boyfriend and i stayed here for a quick disneyland trip and we were pleasantly surprised! The hotel was super close to the park and even closer to a starbucks for an early morning pick me up! It was very clean and spacious for a smaller room, it was so cozy and comfortable as well! Loved it and we will be staying here whenever we are down for vacation!!!
Manager Response: Dear Muh2tay, I am so happy you found our hotel to be a good choice for your vacation.  Thank you for taking time to write about your stay.  Positive input like yours means so much to us and our future guests appreciate it too. See you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: The location is good with just approximately 1.2km to Disney. The room is clean with comfortable bed,microwave, refrigerator ，hairdryer,etc. Parking here is free.That is also the plus. In brief,I have enjoyed the stay here.
Manager Response: Dear Zhen C, I want to thank you for taking time to let our future guests know about your stay.  I am happy we were able to provide a clean and convenient place for you to stay during your vacation.  Our number one goal is to make every stay a wonderful one.  I hope you visit and stay with us again.

Summary: I had great stay here and it is close to the major highways.  Loved the hardwood floors.  The staff were great and very helpful.  Clean hotel in a safe location.  Parking can be tight and the fireworks at night can be loud.  The walls are thin so you can hear your people in the next room and if you stay on the bottom floor you can hear people walking above you.
Manager Response: Dear Smithke2018, Thank you so much for first, choosing to stay with us and secondly, taking time to let us know how we did.  I am happy to hear you appreciated our cleanliness and safety.  Nothing matters more to us than making sure every guest enjoys their vacation.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to sunny Southern California and Anaheim.

Summary: From the moment we checked in, staff was  great, rooms were clean & updated. And all basic amenities  we're there in the room. We were there for a family vacation, and they were able to get our rooms together which made things easy for us. For the price, it's a nice room & location. Will be staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Spatzycat, I want to personally thank you for taking time to write about your stay with us. It makes me happy to know our team was able to make your family vacation just a little better.  We really do work hard to make sure our little hotel is the perfect place for families when they visit Anaheim and Disneyland. I hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: Firstly, I have to say, the staff here are just stellar. Extremely kind and accommodating. You just don't see people this kind and attentive anymore when it comes to customer service. Ok, on to the room. The room looks exactly how it did in the pictures. No special filters or angles here. You will get exactly what you see. However, when we went into the room, there was this EXTREMELY overpowering powder fresh/chemical smell. I mean, almost knocked me on my rear. We had to leave the door open, open the windows and turn on the fan to try to clear it out. My allergies went insane. I sneezed and coughed all night. We stayed 3 nights and left the DND sign up, fearing that the cleaning staff might use that deoderizor again. We could still smell it on day 3. The bed was soft and the
Manager Response: Dear Ahkila, I sincerely appreciate you taking time to let our future guests know about the hotel.  I am happy to hear that the rooms were clean and what you expected to see when you booked the rooms.  I will speak to our housekeeping staff about the fragrance used in the rooms.  I understand that guests may be sensitive to some smells,  In the future, please do reach out to us and we will make sure to address your concerns during your stay. I hope you give us another chance to make your stay a 5-star stay.

Summary Heading: Great location, wonderful staff, will be back!
Summary: We had a fabulous stay at Hotel 414. The rooms are clean and have all the amenities you need. We planned a long day at Disneyland so the proximity to the park was perfect for us. I have some chemical sensitivities and the manager of the hotel was kind enough to open several rooms for me until we found one that worked. I couldn't be more positive about our sweet experience at this lovely little hotel.
Manager Response: Dear HappyTraveler108108,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we know you have many choices when you visit Anaheim.  Your Tripadvisor name is exactly what our entire team strives to make all our guests.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: My wife and my 1 year old son love this hotel from the check in to check out! Very friendly staff at the front desk with great concierge services. Rooms are clean and modern with sufficient amenities. Very conveniently located just off the 5 fwy and closer to Disney, restaurants and shopping was a very huge factor when i selected this hotel.it is also located in a very safe neighborhood I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Anaheim, CA looking for clean, safe, affordable, convenient and comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Thilanjan, I am so happy to hear that our little hotel was the perfect choice for you and your family.  We know you have many other hotels to choose from.  Thank you from the entire team at Hotel 414 Anaheim for staying with us.

Summary: I booked 2 rooms for our family and the stay was very comfortable and conveniently located . I loved the idea of wood floors  over carpet  and the room being simple and clean . The staff was wonderful on the phone and in person , Thank you !  We would definitely  stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Hfamily7, I am so happy you and your family loved our wood flooring.  All our guests appreciate the cleanliness of our rooms without carpet.
